I think I have just the recommendation for you! Since you mentioned enjoying the sound of The Watcher, I'm going to suggest two movies that might pique your interest.

Firstly, "The Stuff" (1972) seems like a great match, as it has a similar blend of suspense and dark humor. Starring Danny Aiello, Garrett Morris, and Paul Sorvino, this campy classic follows the rise and fall of a mysterious dessert sensation that takes over the world.

If you're looking for something more uplifting, "It's a Wonderful Life" (1946) is a timeless classic that explores themes of self-discovery and the human spirit. With a star-studded cast, including James Stewart and Donna Reed, this heartwarming film will leave you feeling hopeful and inspired.

Let me know if either of these strike your fancy!
